typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AccumulatorAdjustmentGUID as string,
		ClientMembershipGUID as string,
		SalesOrderDetailGUID as string,
		AppointmentGUID as string,
		AccumulatorID as integer,
		AccumulatorActionTypeID as integer,
		QuantityUsedOriginal as integer,
		QuantityUsedAdjustment as integer,
		QuantityTotalOriginal as integer,
		QuantityTotalAdjustment as integer,
		MoneyOriginal as decimal(21,6),
		MoneyAdjustment as decimal(21,6),
		DateOriginal as date,
		DateAdjustment as date,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary,
		QuantityUsedNewCalc as integer,
		QuantityUsedChangeCalc as integer,
		QuantityTotalNewCalc as integer,
		QuantityTotalChangeCalc as integer,
		MoneyNewCalc as decimal(22,6),
		MoneyChangeCalc as decimal(23,6),
		SalesOrderTenderGuid as string,
		ClientMembershipAddOnID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CNTdatAccumulatorAdjustment
CNTdatAccumulatorAdjustment alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		AccumulatorAdjustmentGUID as string,
		ClientMembershipGUID as string,
		SalesOrderDetailGUID as string,
		AppointmentGUID as string,
		AccumulatorID as integer,
		AccumulatorActionTypeID as integer,
		QuantityUsedOriginal as integer,
		QuantityUsedAdjustment as integer,
		QuantityTotalOriginal as integer,
		QuantityTotalAdjustment as integer,
		MoneyOriginal as decimal(21,6),
		MoneyAdjustment as decimal(21,6),
		DateOriginal as date,
		DateAdjustment as date,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary,
		QuantityUsedNewCalc as integer,
		QuantityUsedChangeCalc as integer,
		QuantityTotalNewCalc as integer,
		QuantityTotalChangeCalc as integer,
		MoneyNewCalc as decimal(22,6),
		MoneyChangeCalc as decimal(23,6),
		SalesOrderTenderGuid as string,
		ClientMembershipAddOnID as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['AccumulatorAdjustmentGUID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		AccumulatorAdjustmentGUID,
		ClientMembershipGUID,
		SalesOrderDetailGUID,
		AppointmentGUID,
		AccumulatorID,
		AccumulatorActionTypeID,
		QuantityUsedOriginal,
		QuantityUsedAdjustment,
		QuantityTotalOriginal,
		QuantityTotalAdjustment,
		MoneyOriginal,
		MoneyAdjustment,
		DateOriginal,
		DateAdjustment,
		CreateDate,
		CreateUser,
		LastUpdate,
		LastUpdateUser,
		QuantityUsedNewCalc,
		QuantityUsedChangeCalc,
		QuantityTotalNewCalc,
		QuantityTotalChangeCalc,
		MoneyNewCalc,
		MoneyChangeCalc,
		SalesOrderTenderGuid,
		ClientMembershipAddOnID
	)) ~> ODSdatAccumulatorAdjustment

parameters{
	FilePath as string,
	DolarToday as string
}
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CalendarDateEST as string,
		CalendarTimeEST as string,
		BroadcastDateEST as string,
		LocalAirTime as string,
		Purpose as string,
		Method as string,
		Channel as string,
		Medium as string,
		Company as string,
		Location as string,
		BudgetType as string,
		BudgetName as string,
		Source as string,
		Affiliate as string,
		Station as string,
		Show as string,
		ContentType as string,
		Content as string,
		CampaignType as string,
		Campaign as string,
		ISCI as string,
		MasterNumber as string,
		TFN as string,
		Sourcecode as string,
		PromoCode as string,
		URL as string,
		Agency as string,
		Region as string,
		DMACode as string,
		DMAName as string,
		Audience as string,
		Tactic as string,
		Placement as string,
		Format as string,
		Language as string,
		GrossSpend as string,
		NetSpend as string,
		{Impressions18-65} as string,
		GRP as string,
		Spots as string,
		LogType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CSVReport
CSVReport filter(!isNull(TransactionID)) ~> FilterNulls
FilterNulls select(mapColumn(
		transactionid = TransactionID,
		calendardateest = CalendarDateEST,
		calendartimeest = CalendarTimeEST,
		broadcastdateest = BroadcastDateEST,
		localairtime = LocalAirTime,
		purpose = Purpose,
		method = Method,
		channel = Channel,
		medium = Medium,
		company = Company,
		location = Location,
		budgettype = BudgetType,
		budgetname = BudgetName,
		source = Source,
		affiliate = Affiliate,
		station = Station,
		show = Show,
		contenttype = ContentType,
		content = Content,
		campaigntype = CampaignType,
		campaign = Campaign,
		isci = ISCI,
		masternumber = MasterNumber,
		tfn = TFN,
		sourcecode = Sourcecode,
		promocode = PromoCode,
		url = URL,
		agency = Agency,
		region = Region,
		dmacode = DMACode,
		dmaname = DMAName,
		audiene = Audience,
		tactic = Tactic,
		placement = Placement,
		format = Format,
		language = Language,
		grossspend = GrossSpend,
		netspend = NetSpend,
		{impressions18-65} = {Impressions18-65},
		grp = GRP,
		spots = Spots,
		logtype = LogType
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
HourFormat derive(FilePath = $FilePath,
		DWH_LoadDate = currentTimestamp(),
		netspend = toString(toDecimal(netspend)*toDecimal($DolarToday)),
		CADPrice = toDecimal($DolarToday)) ~> AddCustomColumns
SelectColumns derive(calendartimeest = concat(replace(trim(calendartimeest),right(trim(calendartimeest), 1), ''), ' ',right(trim(calendartimeest), 1) , 'M')) ~> HourFormat
AddCustomColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		transactionid as string,
		calendardateest as string,
		calendartimeest as string,
		broadcastdateest as string,
		localairtime as string,
		purpose as string,
		method as string,
		channel as string,
		medium as string,
		company as string,
		location as string,
		budgettype as string,
		budgetname as string,
		source as string,
		affiliate as string,
		station as string,
		show as string,
		contenttype as string,
		content as string,
		campaigntype as string,
		campaign as string,
		isci as string,
		masternumber as string,
		tfn as string,
		sourcecode as string,
		promocode as string,
		url as string,
		agency as string,
		region as string,
		dmacode as string,
		dmaname as string,
		audiene as string,
		tactic as string,
		placement as string,
		format as string,
		language as string,
		grossspend as string,
		netspend as string,
		{impressions18-65} as string,
		grp as string,
		spots as string,
		logtype as string,
		{impressions35+} as string,
		trp as string,
		DWH_LoadDate as timestamp,
		FilePath as string,
		CADSpend as decimal(19,4),
		CADPrice as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		transactionid,
		calendardateest,
		calendartimeest,
		broadcastdateest,
		localairtime,
		purpose,
		method,
		channel,
		medium,
		company,
		location,
		budgettype,
		budgetname,
		source,
		affiliate,
		station,
		show,
		contenttype,
		content,
		campaigntype,
		campaign,
		isci,
		masternumber,
		tfn,
		sourcecode,
		promocode,
		url,
		agency,
		region,
		dmacode,
		dmaname,
		audiene,
		tactic,
		placement,
		format,
		language,
		grossspend,
		netspend,
		{impressions18-65},
		grp,
		spots,
		logtype,
		DWH_LoadDate,
		FilePath,
		CADPrice
	)) ~> ODSTelevision

		Name,
		CurrencyIsoCode,
		CreatedDate,
		CreatedById,
		LastModifiedDate,
		LastModifiedById,
		SystemModstamp,
		LastActivityDate,
		ACEDescription__c,
		ActiveCampaignsDesktop__c,
		ActiveCampaignsMobile__c,
		Company__c,
		DNIS__c,
		Description__c,
		LanguageCode__c,
		LocationCode__c,
		Misc_Code__c,
		Notes__c,
		Number__c,
